experiences: Designed a model to 3D print for the toboggan headlights cover using OnShape.
Implemented L.E.D headlights with an Arduino to connect a power source and switch.
Wrote a C++ program to control the actions of the switch to turn the light on or off.
Competed in the Great Northern Concrete Toboggan Race (GNCTR) 2024 and preparing for GNCTR 2025.
Coding part of the CubeSat satellite using PlantUML.
Tailored course information to individual students to help them fill in their knowledge gaps.
Effectively communicated difficult concepts to students in a productive and patient manner.
